00024         class Texture
00025         {
00026         public:
00027                 Texture(): 
00028                   myInitialized(false), 
00029                   myDirty(true),
00030                   myData(NULL) {}
00031 
00032                 bool isDirty() { return myDirty; }
00033                 void setDirty() { myDirty = true; }
00034 
00035                 byte* getData() { return myData; }
00036                 void setData(byte* data, int width, int height) { myData = data; myWidth = width; myHeight = height; }
00037 
00038                 int getWidth() { return myWidth; }
00039                 int getHeight() { return myHeight; }
00040 
00041                 GLuint getGLTexture() { if(myDirty) refresh(); return myId; }
00042 
00043                 OUTK_API virtual void refresh();
00044 
00045         private:
00046                 bool myInitialized;
00047                 bool myDirty;
00048                 GLuint myId;
00049                 GLubyte* myData;
00050                 int myWidth;
00051                 int myHeight;
00052         };
